name: Wood Ward
description: A medium-sized construct made from wood and enchantments, the Wood Ward serves as a protector of natural spaces.
memorable: It can instill fear through its Horror Gaze ability, creating a distinct crowd control feature.
goals: To guard natural areas and repel intruders.
relations: Often associated with nature deities or magical forests.
environment: Typically found in natural spaces or enchanted forests.
strengths: High Constitution grants it excellent durability, and it is immune to many conditions.
attacks: Utilizes Multiattack for two slam attacks dealing bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Horror Gaze, inducing fear in creatures caught in its eerie glow.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, useful for detecting creatures in dim light.
additional_information: Magic Resistance provides advantage on saving throws against spells.
Immutable Form prevents any alteration of its physical form.
Immunity to poison and psychic damage.
Effective as an area control unit due to its fear-inducing ability.
Created with enchantments to serve as a magical guardian.
test_queries: magical wooden ward with slam attack
